segments.text: Would you please take a seat over there , madam ? I ’ ll let Mr . Emory know that you ’ re here .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , it may take some time . Mr . Emory ’ s at a meeting at the moment . It would probably be more comfortable over there .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I see . All right , then . Thanks .
segments.speaker: S2
